snippet: RATNER--Michael. The Puffin Foundation notes with sorrow the loss of our esteemed colleague and friend, whose devotion to equal justice and human rights led to the bestowal of our highest honor, the Puffin-Nation Award for Creative Citizenship. We extend condolences to his wife and family. The Rosenstein Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: RATNER--Michael. The Puffin Foundation notes with sorrow the loss of our esteemed colleague and friend, whose devotion to equal justice and human rights led to the bestowal of our highest honor, the Puffin-Nation Award for Creative Citizenship. We extend condolences to his wife and family. The Rosenstein Family 1/3
